article_title: Levi Ogden death: Man who killed partner by throwing phone jailed
article_description: A judge says Lloyd Birkby  poses a significant risk of harm to intimate future partners
article_content: Image copyrightWest Yorkshire PoliceImage caption  Lloyd Birkby admitted manslaughter in March A mother of two died after her drunken boyfriend threw a mobile phone at her neck during a row  a court has heard Levi Ogden  26  suffered a cardiac arrest afte   1841 chars
